EmailTemplate.name: CDFA - Experience Cloud - PSP: New Member Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New - California {!Community_Name} Online System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to the new {!Community_Name} (PSP) Online Portal!
As a user you will have access to the Portal to print and view your Service Agent License.
Please save this website link and email for future reference - to login to the PSP Portal to view your account, including your updated inspection information.
For future reference, your username is {!Receiving_User.Username}.
For PSP Program information, please visit CDFA - PSP - Produce Safety Program.
PSP Administrator Produce Safety Program {!Organization.Name} {!Community_Url}
Questions? Please contact us at psp@cdfa.ca.gov.
